data.actual_result: Text is typed in the send message bar
data.expected_result: Typed text goes in the user search in the add user popup
data.short_description: Group DM User Search to add user unfocuses when clicking a user and trying to type again
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to user - Click Create Group DM button - Type a user to add - Click user - Without clicking the box again, start typing
